title: Deeply Troubling Information From A Source In Afghanistan (Ep 1586)
description:
I heard some troubling information from a source yesterday about the deteriorating situation in Afghanistan. In this episode, I address the unfolding disaster. 

News Picks:


The Taliban is using Twitter to organize their attacks, while President Trump is still banned.

The Biden administration isn’t prioritizing American citizens for evacuation from Afghanistan.

The Taliban seized US Blackhawk Helicopters.

The intell community says they warned Biden about the possibility of a collapse.

Breaking: source says suspected terrorists are coming across southern border. 

New Zealand locks down over one covid case.


Copyright Dan Bongino All Rights Reserved.
